stimulusHtml: Kailas Cars produces cars that are made of both steel and aluminum. Steel and aluminum are substitutes in production. Kailas Carsâ€™ demand for steel will increase if which of the following occurs?
choicesHtml: The supply of gasoline, a complement to cars, decreases.
The wages of workers in the car industry increase.
The amount of time that people keep their cars increases.
